inputs.selection_motivation: Sustainability leadership sets industry standards and expectations that directly drive the adoption of thematic portfolio investing strategies.
inputs.candidate_motivation: Sustainability Leadership is closely tied to environmental finance, green technologies, and ESG-driven investment strategies, so topics that address climate funding, nature-based insurance, carbon capture hubs, and thematic ESG investing are natural influences or peers. Trade policy also indirectly shapes sustainability initiatives by affecting global supply chains and regulatory frameworks.

proposed_link.motivation: Sustainability leadership sets industry standards and expectations that directly drive the adoption of thematic portfolio investing strategies.
